import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Heading from '..';

<Meta title="Components/Heading" />

<Story name="Import" />

# Heading

Heading component implies all the font changes, paragraph breaks before and after, and any white space necessary to render the heading.

## Import

```jsx
import { Heading } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={Heading} />

## Usage

### Default

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="1. Default">
    <>
      <section>
        <Heading type='h1'>Heading H1</Heading>
        <Heading type='h2'>Heading H2</Heading>
        <Heading type='h3'>Heading H3</Heading>
        <Heading type='h4'>Heading H4</Heading>
        <Heading type='h5'>Heading H5</Heading>
        <Heading type='h6'>Heading H6</Heading>
      </section>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### Italic

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="2. Italic">
    <>
      <section>
        <Heading type='h1' isItalic>Heading H1</Heading>
        <Heading type='h2' isItalic>Heading H2</Heading>
        <Heading type='h3' isItalic>Heading H3</Heading>
        <Heading type='h4' isItalic>Heading H4</Heading>
        <Heading type='h5' isItalic>Heading H5</Heading>
        <Heading type='h6' isItalic>Heading H6</Heading>
      </section>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### Assistive

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="3. Assistive">
    <>
      <section>
        <Heading type='h1' isAssistive>Heading H1</Heading>
        <Heading type='h2' isAssistive>Heading H2</Heading>
        <Heading type='h3' isAssistive>Heading H3</Heading>
        <Heading type='h4' isAssistive>Heading H4</Heading>
        <Heading type='h5' isAssistive>Heading H5</Heading>
        <Heading type='h6' isAssistive>Heading H6</Heading>
      </section>
    </>
  </Story>
